product_name: DiorEye and Lip Makeup Remover Purifying Nymphea Bi-Phase Makeup Remover
summary: SummaryThe Dior Eye and Lip Makeup Remover Purifying Nymphéa Bi-Phase Makeup Remover effortlessly removes makeup while hydrating and soothing the sensitive areas.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe bi-phase formula combines an oily phase and water-based phase to remove all makeup.Key IngredientsFRENCH WATER LILY (Nymphéa) French water lily helps purify* the skin. Purifying water lily is renowned for its ability to eliminate impurities* through the chelation phenomenon.Chelation involves trapping and retaining impurities such as heavy metals so that they do not spread in water.*Ex vivo test on skin explant.Research ResultsInstantly: - 97%* reduction in even the finest pollution particles, after only one application. - Skin pH is protected.After 6 hours: - Skin is 18% more hydrated.***Instrumental test on 33 women on 1-µm to 49-µm particles.**Instrumental test on 30 subjects after 6h.Item 2625454How To UseBefore each use, shake the bottle and mix the oil phase with the water-based phase.Soak a cotton pad with the makeup remover, then cleanse the eyelids, lashes and lips. Then, carefully swipe to remove makeup.Repeat until all makeup is removed.IngredientsAqua (Water), Caprylyl Methicone, Octyldodecanol, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Nymphaea Alba Root Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum (Fragrance), Glycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Potassium Sorbate, CI 42090 (Blue 1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Before each use, shake the bottle and mix the oil phase with the water-based phase.Soak a cotton pad with the makeup remover, then cleanse the eyelids, lashes and lips. Then, carefully swipe to remove makeup.Repeat until all makeup is removed.
